books.author: by Glenn Beck and others
books.description: An argument against gun restriction laws.
books.name: CONTROL

books.author: by Amanda Knox
books.description: Knox, who was convicted of the murder of her roommate in 2009 when she was an American student in Italy, a conviction that was overturned in 2011, tells her story.
books.name: WAITING TO BE HEARD

books.author: by Sheryl Sandberg with Nell Scovell
books.description: The chief operating officer of Facebook urges women to pursue their careers without ambivalence.
books.name: LEAN IN

books.author: by David Sedaris
books.description: Essays from the humorist on subjects like French dentistry and a North Carolina Costco.
books.name: LET'S EXPLORE DIABETES WITH OWLS

books.author: by Eben Alexander
books.description: A neurosurgeon recounts his near death experience during a coma from bacterial meningitis.
books.name: PROOF OF HEAVEN

books.author: by Michael Pollan
books.description: The writer masters recipes and argues that regaining control of cooking will make Americans healthier.
books.name: COOKED

books.author: by Nathaniel Philbrick
books.description: The story of the battle that marked the point of no return for the rebellious American colonists.
books.name: BUNKER HILL

books.author: by Susannah Cahalan
books.description: A medical mystery in which doctors struggle to discover why a young reporter experiences seizures and hallucinations.
books.name: BRAIN ON FIRE

books.author: by Cheryl Strayed
books.description: A woman’s account of a life-changing 1,100-mile hike along the Pacific Crest Trail during the summer of 1995.
books.name: WILD

books.author: by Dave Liniger with Laura Morton
books.description: The founder of Re/Max recounts his ordeal with a staph infection that left him paralyzed.
books.name: MY NEXT STEP

books.author: by Chris Kyle with Scott McEwen and Jim DeFelice
books.description: A member of the Navy SEALs who had the most career sniper kills in United States military history discusses his childhood, his marriage and his battlefield experiences during the Iraq war. Kyle was recently shot to death in Texas.
books.name: AMERICAN SNIPER

books.author: by Charles Graeber
books.description: A journalist tells the story of Charlie Cullen, the serial killer known as “the Angel of Death,” implicated in the deaths of as many as 300 patients in a string of hospitals.
books.name: THE GOOD NURSE

books.author: by Eric Schmidt and Jared Cohen
books.description: The promise and peril of the continuing information and technology revolution.
books.name: THE NEW DIGITAL AGE

books.author: by Alison Weir
books.description: An account of the powerful English king and his court.
books.name: HENRY VIII

books.author: by Bill O'Reilly and Martin Dugard
books.description: The host of “The O’Reilly Factor” recounts the assassination of John F. Kennedy.
books.name: KILLING KENNEDY
